Source [armstrng]

definition
let R be DB-Rel ;
let A, B be Subset of the Attributes of R;
pred A >|> B,R means :: ARMSTRNG:def 7
 for f, g being Element of the Relationship of R st f | A = g | A holds
f | B = g | B;
end;
